nodes.text: The Heartache Bistro was a cantina located in Nar Shaddaa's Red Light Sector. Though initially a poor, rarely visited location, a new owner named Narissa helped to transform the Bistro into one of Nar Shaddaa's premier restaurants. During the Galactic Civil War, the Bistro entered into an agreement with a Hutt kajidic to sell Tempest spice.
